scripts.start: npm run livereload | npm run server | npm run watch:css | npm run watch:js | npm run watch:files
scripts.watch:js: watchify src/js/app.js --debug --verbose --outfile build/js/bundle.js --transform [ browserify-shim ] --transform [ babelify --only src/js --presets env ] --plugin [ livereloadify-script ]
scripts.prebuild: npm run eslint && npm run create
scripts.build: npm run build:css | npm run build:js | npm run build:files
scripts.build:js: browserify src/js/app.js --transform [ browserify-shim ] --transform [ babelify --only src/js --presets env ] | uglifyjs -c > build/js/bundle.js
